roleset.name: stand for, correspond, signify

role.descr: entity being substituted by the other

example.name: transitive active
example.text: These so-called ADRs represent shares of foreign companies traded in the US.
example.arg: shares of foreign companies traded in the US.

example.name: with ArgA
example.text: In his depiction of the Battle of Gettysburg, John represented the Confederate soldiers with salt shakers.
example.arg: In his depiction of the Battle of Gettysburg

example.name: stand in for someone
example.text: I think that I-1 'm elected [*trace*-1]-2 *trace*-2 to represent the people that sent me here .
example.arg: the people that sent me here

roleset.note: 'represent' based on big corpus; 'representative' on BOLT-1. Member of Vncls characterize-29.2-1-1.

example.name: adjectival rel: representative
example.text: Obama is n't representative of anything .
